entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Occasional drifting snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023
